summary.span: 包含可选项列表。

span.span: Contains a list of selectable items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 中的多个项可见，与不同，其中具有仅选定的项可见，除非属性是`true`。More than one item in a is visible, unlike the , which has only the selected item visible unless the property is `true`. 属性确定是否多个项中是可选择一次。The property determines whether more than one item in the is selectable at a time. 属性确定多少个项的用户可以选择一次。The property determines how many items a user can select at one time. 将属性设置为（默认值）， ，或。You can set the property to (the default), , or . 下表介绍了这些枚举值的行为。The following table described the behavior of these enumeration values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||用户一次只能选择一项。The user can select only one item at a time.| ||用户可以选择多个项而无需按下修改键。The user can select multiple items without holding down a modifier key.| ||用户可以在按住 SHIFT 键或非连续项通过按住 CTRL 键并单击的项目的同时选择多个连续的项。The user can select multiple consecutive items while holding down the SHIFT key or non-consecutive items by holding down the CTRL key and clicking the items.| 控件通常用于数据绑定。 controls are often used with data binding. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 显示大量的项会导致性能问题。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 请参阅[优化性能： 控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)有关详细信息。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) for more information. ## 自定义列表框控件Customizing the ListBox Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ListBox 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ListBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并订阅事件。The following example creates a and subscribes to the event. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]
